element.name: 15 A Walk in the Garden-Duff Bluff by Kili or bust, Traditional Cache (1.5/3)

center.font: Visit The Geocaching Ireland discussion forum HERE

element.long-description:
The map above indicates 5 caches that are virtually "in a row". It is quite a walk to get all of them but on a summer day it would be nice. You can of course come back down to the Military Road at many points along the way and if you decide to do the lot then you would have a long road walk back to a car. There is a newer car park at the exit from the mountains at Carrigshouk. With a car parked at either end a group could manage this quite well.
Duff Hill can be reached from several angles but the one I used was The Military Rd around Sally Gap. You can park many places. One ideal spot to "attack" this would be N53 06.334 W006 20.307.
Good sturdy hiking gear would be useful unless there has been a lot of good weather. Map (Discovery series 56)and compass too as it can get misty.
element.url-name: 15 A Walk in the Garden-Duff Bluff

ul.li:
2010-05-16T19:00:00Z : Found it by daraconn
After Carrigshouk and Mullaghcleevaun, I next visited this hill. I had been here just over a year ago, but the cache was missing. Now I am the first to find the replacement cache! Having learned from my mistake last year, I did not try to descend directly to the road down the east side of the mountain. Instead I doubled back to Mullaghcleevaun East Top and down the valley of the Inchavore to the parking place. Very enjoyable afternoon's walking, and great to get two caches that I had previously logged DNF, thanks!

2010-04-30T19:00:00Z : Owner Maintenance by Kili or bust
Apologies for the delay getting to this one but I have now replaced the cache and all is in order again. Thanks to all for letting me know!

2010-04-19T22:07:31Z : Needs Maintenance by Spark_ie
Searched and searched for this one, co-ords took me to the only realistic hidey hole, and no cache to be found. Great views from here, bit boggy getting here from the road, after that climb I really do need a Duff ! [:)]

2009-12-28T20:00:00Z : Didn't find it by Rita666
Hello from Latvia! It was hard to go up there, because there was a lot of snow and cold wind. But I did it! :)) And it was only begining of my diurnal walking through the Wicklow mountains. But I didn't find the cache, because there was a lot of snow and ice. But anyway thanks for the cache!

2009-10-17T19:00:00Z : Write note by Kili or bust
Just a name change to tie in with the rest of the series.

wpt.name: GCN57X
wpt.desc: 15 A Walk in the Garden-Duff Bluff by Kili or bust, Traditional Cache (1.5/3)
wpt.urlname: 15 A Walk in the Garden-Duff Bluff
